articles.title: JMPD officer in critical condition following assault by 'after tears' partygoers
articles.description: A Johannesburg Metro Police Department Public Order officer was assaulted and sustained injuries to his face after he tried to disperse a crowd hosting a funeral "after tears" party.
articles.content:
• About 150 people are said to have attended the gathering.
  • While some left when JMPD officers arrived at the illegal event, others refused, resulting in them assaulting one officer.
